items.content_html: üö• The best job scheduler for Node.js and JavaScript with cron, dates, ms, later, and human-friendly support. Works in Node v12.11.0+, uses worker threads to spawn sandboxed processes, and supports async/await, retries, throttling, concurrency, and cancelable promises (graceful shutdown). Simple, fast, and lightweight. Made for @forwardemail and @ladjs.
items.title: breejs/bree: :traffic_light: The best job scheduler for Node.js and JavaScript with cron, dates, ms, later, and human-friendly support.  Works in Node v12.11.0+, uses worker threads to spawn sandboxed processes, and supports async/await, retries, throttling, concurrency, and cancelable promises (graceful shutdown).  Simple, fast, and lightweight.  Made for @ForwardEmail and @ladjs.
